Reviewer requested changes:

Government.invest_infrastructure violates Sacred Sequence by mutating infrastructure_level directly in the Decision Phase.

Please refactor this to use SystemEffectsManager (e.g. add ffect_type='infrastructure_boost' to Transaction metadata) so the state change happens ONLY after transaction success in the Processing Phase.
